TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MessageHeaderException extends System.ServiceModel.ProtocolException

summary.span: 在处理消息时，如果不能满足与 SOAP 消息头有关的期望，则引发该异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the expectations regarding headers of a SOAP message are not satisfied when the message is processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，当消息中存在太多标头或缺少标头时都会引发此异常。This exception is typically thrown when there are too many headers or headers are missing from the message. 这可以包括基础结构标头，如“操作和可靠消息”标头。This can include infrastructure headers such as the Action and Reliable Message headers. 此异常从 派生，而后者则从 派生。This exception derives from , which in turn derives from . 类表示的可恢复错误的可能终结点与该可靠的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 客户端之间进行通信时引发的类和服务应用程序需要处理。The class represents a class of recoverable errors that may be thrown during communication between endpoints and that robust Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client and service applications are expected to handle. 若要阻止更为通用的 处理程序捕捉更为具体的 ，请在处理 之前捕捉此异常。To prevent the more generic handler from catching the more specific , catch this exception prior to handling .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将错误消息传递给用户，请使用 构造函数。If you want to pass an error message to the user, use the constructor. 如果要将错误消息和内部异常（导致此异常的原因）的引用传递给用户，请使用 构造函数。If you want to pass an error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception to the user, use the constructor. 如果要传递序列化信息和流上下文，请使用 构造函数。If you want to pass serialization information and streaming context, use the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您要将错误消息传递给用户时，请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message to the user. 消息参数的内容应该是预期用户可以理解的。The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class used to deserialize data into a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在反序列化过程中调用此构造函数以还原通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to restore the exception object transmitted over a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您要将错误消息和有关内部异常的信息传递给用户时，请使用此构造函数。Use this constructor when you want to pass an error message and information about an inner exception up to the user. 消息参数的内容应该是预期用户可以理解的。The content of the message parameter should be understandable to the intended users. 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常可以在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception can include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回传递到构造函数中的相同值，或者如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则返回 `Nothing` 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor or a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
